CustomField.formula: IF(Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode=='MPW',"QoS Differentiation allowing a controlled resource distribution and quality attribution to the different users and/or applications individually.",IF(Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode=='POL','FWLT-C card supports 16 MPM (Multi PON Modules). One MPM provide one fiber interface that aggregates 1 XGSPON + 1 GPON separated interfaces. Hence one Line card can support 16 XGSPON + 16 GPON interfaces', IF(Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode=='7362ISAMSF8GWONAR','7362 SF-8GW supports or 8x GPON ports using 4x dual GPON XFP optics: 1 dual XFP provides traffic to 2GPON ports or 4x XGS-PON ports using 4x XGS-PON XFP optics. A maximum of 4x uplink interfaces is supported.A wide list of different standard 10GE SFPs with different reach are supported.','You have decided to override default'+ BR() + 'Aerospike, Please uncheck the checkbox'+ BR() + 'above to see defaults again')))
CustomField.label: Guidance
